SKT_FIRST.name: Execution of Discipline
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. Has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵にダメージを与え。対象に<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다. <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 확률로 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>的几率使目标陷入<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>状态,持续<color=#28d9ed>2</color>回合。

SKT_BURST_1.effect:
+30% Bleed activation chance
Inflicts an additional 2 turn Bleed
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp:
出血発生率+30%
出血追加+2ターン
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh:
出血概率 +30%
出血持续 +2回合

SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: 弱体効果の持続ターン+1ターン
SKT_BURST_2.effect_zh: 弱化效果持续时间+1回合

SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh:
替换为强化技能
追加回合
攻击全体敌人

SKT_SECOND.name: Virtus's Due
SKT_SECOND.name_jp: ヴィルトゥスの分け前
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Before attacking, increase all Water allies' <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>, then attacks an enemy.\nAfter attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to decrease the enemy's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color> and a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unhealable</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nAdditionally increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp:
スキル使用前、水属性の味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>貫通力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせ、敵にダメージを与える。
攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で敵の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間DOWNさせ,
さらに<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で、<color=#28d9ed>回復不可</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。
また、自分の行動ゲージを<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPさせる。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
스킬 사용 전, 수속성 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>관통력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 증가시키고, 적을 공격합니다\n공격 후, <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 적의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 감소시키고\n<color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>회복 불가</color>를 부여합니다.
또한 자신의 행동 게이지를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh:
在使用技能前,使全体水属性友军的<color=#28d9ed>穿透力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>1</color>回合,并攻击敌人。
攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>的概率降低敌人的<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>,持续<color=#28d9ed>1</color>回合;
并有<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>的概率使目标陷入<color=#28d9ed>无法恢复</color>状态,持续<color=#28d9ed>1</color>回合。
此外,使自身的<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>增加<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。

5_jp: 弱体効果の持続ターン+1ターン
5_zh: 弱化效果持续时间+1回合

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Fate of the Traitor
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc:
Before attacking, increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for 1 turn and has a 100% chance to decrease the target's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks an enemy.
After attacking, if the target's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> is decreased, has a <color=#28d9ed>60%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Freeze</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Bleed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
Damage dealt increases according to the number of <color=#28d9ed>Debuff</color> effects on the target, and if the target is affected by <color=#28d9ed>Bleed</color>, performs an additional attack with <color=#28d9ed>Execution of Discipline</color>.
If the target is a Boss, additionally decreases the Boss's Weakness Gauge by 2.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp:
スキル使用前、自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPし、対象の防御力を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせてから、敵にダメージを与える。
攻撃後, 対象の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>がDOWNしている場合、<color=#28d9ed>60%</color>の確率で敵全体に凍結と出血を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。
さらに、対象の<color=#28d9ed>弱体効果</color>が多いほどダメージがUPし、
対象が<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>状態の場合、<color=#28d9ed>規律執行</color>で追加攻撃を与える。
対象がボスの場合、ボスのWGを2追加でDOWNさせる。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr:
스킬 사용 전, 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 증가시키고 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킨 뒤, 적을 공격합니다.
공격 후, 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>가 감소한 상태라면 <color=#28d9ed>60%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>빙결</color>과 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color>을 부여합니다.
대상에게 걸린 <color=#28d9ed>약화</color> 효과가 많을 수록 피해가 증가합니다.
대상이 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color> 상태라면 <color=#28d9ed>규율 집행</color>으로 추가 공격하고
대상이 보스인 경우 WG를 2 추가로 감소시킵니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh:
在使用技能前,使自身的<color=#28d9ed>攻擊力</color>提升,持續<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>,並降低目標的<color=#28d9ed>防禦力</color>,持續<color=#28d9ed>2</color>回合,之後攻擊敵人。
攻擊後,若目標的<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>已降低,則有<color=#28d9ed>60%</color>機率賦予其<color=#28d9ed>冰凍</color>與<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>效果,持續<color=#28d9ed>1</color>回合。
目標身上的<color=#28d9ed>弱化效果</color>越多,造成的傷害越高。
若目標處於<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>狀態,則會追加使用<color=#28d9ed>規律執行</color>進行攻擊。
若目標為首領,則額外降低其2點WG。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Bleed</color> on all enemies with a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance for <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Bleed</color> on the target with a 60%</color> chance for <color=#28d9ed>2</color> turns.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、対象全体に<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、対象に<color=#28d9ed>60%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 적 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color>을 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>60%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 부여합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携同伴效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>概率对全体敌人施加<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>,持续<color=#28d9ed>2</color>回合。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>60%</color>概率对目标施加<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>,持续<color=#28d9ed>2</color>回合。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage

3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage

4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
